pr_title: [CALCITE-3733] MySQL JDBC rewrite should rewrite CAST as TIMESTAMP to CAST as DATETIME (Vineet Garg)

timeline.author: danny0405

timeline.message: [CALCITE-3733] In JDBC adapter, when generating SQL for MYSQL, generate TIMESTAMP type as DATETIME for CAST (Vineet Garg)
[CALCITE-3733] In JDBC adapter, when generating SQL for MYSQL, generate TIMESTAMP type as DATETIME for CAST (Vineet Garg)
